titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Martha Cook Alumnae Association of Ann Arbor records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: Martha Cook Alumnae Association of Ann Arbor

did.unittitle: Martha Cook Alumnae Association of Ann Arbor records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Ann Arbor chapter of organization of alumnae residents of The Martha Cook Building, a residence hall for women students at the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Constitutions, membership materials, newsletters, mailings, e-mail communications, scattered minutes, photos of program events, and miscellaneous other records.
